# init(frame:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a newly allocated matrix with the specified frame.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(frame frameRect: NSRect)
```

## Parameters

- **frameRect**: The frame with which to initialize the matrix.

## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix], initialized with default parameters. The new [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix] contains no rows or columns. The default mode is `NSRadioModeMatrix`. The default cell class is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSActionCell].

## Discussion

.

## Related Documentation

- **Matrix Programming Guide**

## Initializing an NSMatrix Object

- **init(frame:mode:cellClass:numberOfRows:numberOfColumns:)**: Initializes and returns a newly allocated matrix of the specified size using cells of the given class.
- **init(frame:mode:prototype:numberOfRows:numberOfColumns:)**: Initializes and returns a newly allocated matrix of the specified size using the given cell as a prototype.
